room_title: Escape room "The Mad Scientist" by Escape Dalton in Dalton
room_description: You wake up dazed and confused in a hospital room. You’re wearing a hospital gown and have a splitting headache. Leads are attached to your head and chest. The marks on your arm make you believe something has been injected into your body. It is evident that you are someone’s experiment. You have one hour to escape before the return of the Mad Scientist.
